name: allowed_origin_hosts
label: Allowed Popup Checkout Sites
description: Supply the hostnames of websites that you want to allow the popup checkout to be launched from. Enter one per line. Provide the website hostname only (i.e. www.example.com - do not include https://).

name: company_name
label: Company Name
description: The company name that will appear on your cart pages

name: logo_popup
label: Company Icon
description: The main company logo for the popup header. We recommend a square image.

name: favicon
label: Favicon
description: The page favicon image. Providing a square image is highly recommended; images that are not square will automatically be cropped square. For maximum compatibility, the image you provide should be no larger than 196 x 196 pixels.

name: use_product_icon
label: Use Product Icon?
description: Indicates if you would like to use the product image as the popup header icon, if provided.

name: popup_header_bg_image
label: Header Background Image
description: A background image for the popup header.

name: web_font_import
label: Web Font Import
description: If you would like to use external web fonts (such as Google Web Fonts) in your application, provide the URL for the font or fonts here. If you are using Google Web Fonts, go to the Google Web Fonts site, select and customize the font or fonts you want to use, and paste the font URL here. The font URL can be found within the 'href' value of the font link HTML provided by Google Web Fonts. You can then use these fonts in your font definitions under the app Style settings.

name: show_promo_code
label: Show Promo Code
description: Do you want to provide an option for a user to supply a promotion / discount code? If you don't use promo codes, it is recommended to not display this field.

name: promo_code_name
label: Promo Code Name
description: The name you use to refer to promo codes, i.e. Discount Code, Coupon Code, etc.

name: ask_vat_number
label: Request VAT Number
description: If your account is configued to collect VAT from customers in the European Union, this allows you to specify if you want to allow customers to provide a VAT number with their order, which exempts them from VAT.

name: show_card_logos
label: Show Credit Card Logos
description: Indicates if you would like to display logos for the types of credit cards accepted below the credit card fields.

name: enable_languages
label: Enable Languages
description: Allows users to select from different languages during the checkout process.

name: main_shopping_url
label: Main Shopping URL
description: In cases where the customer is redirected to complete an offsite payment (such as PayPal), this is the URL you want the customer returned to upon completion of their order.

name: hide_email_if_provided
label: Hide email, if provided
description: Indicates if you wish to hide the customer email address field, if you provide the customer's email address when POP Checkout loads.

name: hide_name_if_provided
label: Hide name, if provided
description: Indicates if you wish to hide the customer name field, if you provide the customer's name when POP Checkout loads.

name: keep_wallet_session
label: Keep Wallet Session
description: Indicates if you should keep the user signed into their wallet, such as Amazon Pay, after they complete an order. This should only be set to true in circumstances where it is common for users to make multiple purchases in a short period of time.

name: receipt_close_button_text
label: Receipt Button Text
description: Upon completion of an order, a mini-receipt is displayed with a button near the bottom that closes the popup when clicked. Select the text you would like to appear on this button.
